name: Criminal 101
description:
Hey, welcome to play my game. This is my midterm project for IGD.

Something I must say at the top

This is NOT a real me. Things happened in this game never really happened on me. And that's why I'm not sure how should I talk about this  game here.  If some of the contents offends you, that's not what I want and I apologize for that. 

Control

WASD - Move

Space - Interact

H - Hide

U- Unhide

E - enter door/ pick up items

Design Brief

When I started this project, I imagine it to be a chill little game that player stuffs (like doctor notes, answer for test) from teachers in a middle school to benefit his/her school life. For the final result, the mechanic is pretty mush the same, but narrative changes a lot.
